title: System Security Risk Assessment
description: A GRC analyst must perform a security risk assessment on a legacy, business-critical application that cannot be easily patched.

tasks.description: Identify all known vulnerabilities in the legacy application and the business impact if it were compromised.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst creates a comprehensive list of vulnerabilities and their potential business impact.

tasks.description: Identify existing compensating controls (e.g., network segmentation, enhanced monitoring) that reduce the risk.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst identifies all controls currently in place to protect the system.

tasks.description: Calculate the residual risk and formally accept it in the risk register, with a recommendation for eventual system replacement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly documents the residual risk and makes a strategic recommendation to address it long-term.
